story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Qurrah was founded with a simple belief: everyone deserves access to stylish, high-quality eyewear without breaking the bank.
story.paragraph2: What started as a small idea has grown into a mission to transform how people experience eyewear. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern design to create frames that are as unique as you are.
